Trademark Registration Request - USA
Please fill out the following form, once your Trademark Application is filed, we will send you a Filing Report which will include an application number and date.

This is optional, don't worry if you don't have a Logo.
Describe Products or Services
Please provide a brief description of the products or services that will be used in connection to your trademark. Note: If you have experience with trademarks, and know your trademark class number, you can specify it by using this class selector, What are trademark classes?
Trademark Class Selector
Select the Classes for your Trademark Comprehensive Study, if you are not sure about classes, please leave them empty and close this window.

Trademark Classes

You want us to hold the application filing until we receive the Power of Attorney.
You want us to immediatly file your trademark. Notice that this option has an additonal cost, and you have a time limit to send the Power of Attorney.
